msg: Hi! I hear you're a Magic the Gathering fan! So am I!!
Awesome! Yeah, it's probably my favorite hobby. I've been playing for years.
Same! I started playing when I was a kid and I've been hooked ever since.
That's so cool. Yeah I really like the fantasy world. I read a lot of books in the fantasy genre.
Oh that's awesome! Do you have a favorite book?
Oof. Hard to say. There's been so many, but I'm finally reading the Game of Thrones series and those have obviously been incredible!
Yeah I should really read more, but I probably play too much Magic haha. I actually have a tournament this weekend in my city to defend my title.
